com.jgoodies.forms.tutorial.building
Class ButtonOrderExample

java.lang.Object
  com.jgoodies.forms.tutorial.building.ButtonOrderExample

public final class ButtonOrderExample
extends java.lang.Object

Demonstrates how to build button bars with a fixed button order or with a button order that honors the platform's style.

See Also:
ButtonBarBuilder, ButtonBarFactory

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

buildPanel

public javax.swing.JComponent buildPanel()
Builds and returns a panel that consists of three paragraphs that demonstrate different button orders. Each paragraph contains a button bar that is built from a button sequence, and another bar that is built from individual buttons.

Returns:
a panel that demonstrates button order
